data.oai_dc:dc: PISCO: Physical Oceanography: moored temperature data: Soquel Point, California, USA (SQP001)

This metadata record describes moored seawater temperature data collected at Soquel Point, California, USA, by PISCO. Measurements were collected using StowAway XTI Temperature Loggers (Onset Computer Corp. XTI32-05+37) beginning 2004-02-21. The instrument depth was 005 meters, in an overall water depth of 021 meters (both relative to Mean Sea Level, MSL). The sampling interval was 2.0 minutes.
